postMessage: I'm so excited to see this website up and running it makes me so happy to have a place where people can talk about video games in a constructive critical manner
I like how clean this website is it makes it so easy to post your ideas
I hate how some gamers think they're better than everyone else it ruins the experience for everyone else and gives gamers a bad name
My boyfriend doesn't believe that girls can play games even though I beat him at every game we play. It's SO FRUSTRATING!!!!!!!!!!!!
